channel.title: Monsters And Home place
channel.description:
Hello guys , just wanting to know how i whould move monsters like training monsters and how i whould add them , and how i whould change the home so when a player logs on he is and where he spawns when he dies
if anyone can help with any of these problems please post , thanks
-lewis.
o and 1 more thing , where can i download a client called silabsoft i dont know where i can get 1 its hard because the online 1 laggs bad on localhost , thanks again

item.title: Monsters And Home place
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

The client is in the downloads section. And the lag is your computer, I’m pretty sure it’s not the client.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Well, you can try http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,204094.0.html. I’ll keep an eye out for something you may like more.

item.title: Monsters And Home place
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

ChaosPkers:

I’m assuming the silab client is down? Um, there is a download version of the silab client.

Yeah , the code you have to put in fails for me , i tried so many times just to put it in … i dont know whats wrong with it.

item.title: Monsters And Home place
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

ChaosPkers:

Autospawn is actually for all NPC spawn in your server. And for reapagescape v2, you would look in client.java for your home and death coordinates.

Thanks , dont suppose you whould know of a client that is silab compatable?

Read full topic

item.title: Monsters And Home place
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“Lewis), post:3, topic:287214”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=379802.msg2855627#msg2855627 date=1246830970]
Monsters (NPC’s) = Autospawn.cfg

Spawn points = Client.java, player.java, depends which source you use.
[/quote]It is, autospawn.cfg is for global npcs as I call them, so they are used for all npcs.

I thought autospawn was just for shops? and im using reapage v2 , what should i search in either?[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Monsters And Home place

item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

Autospawn is actually for all NPC spawn in your server. And for reapagescape v2, you would look in client.java for your home and death coordinates.
